name: Elvis Pferdley
description:
this is Elvis Pferdley (all puns intended), it was painted following a palette based on the trans-flag, this NFT is intended to raise funds to help a friend of mine to start his transition through hormone therapy.

another great way of helping is by ordering a commission piece directly from him on his instagram (↓), he's an artist too (and a great one)!
https://www.instagram.com/meta.morphozis/

2260x3196
(all transactions outside blockchain will be testified on my twitter account @vardawannarest)
